missionTitle: NASA’s Artemis I Spacecraft Prepped to Depart to Ohio Facility
summary: NASA's Artemis I spacecraft is getting ready in Florida. It traveled very far in space and landed in water. Now it's going to Ohio for more checks.

missionTitle: One Year Ago: Artemis I Lifts Off
summary: A year ago, NASA's Artemis I went to space. It flew around the Moon and came back after a long trip.
After two test trips, Artemis III will go to the Moon. This will be the first time in 50 years! Astronauts will explore near the Moon's South Pole.

missionTitle: First Artemis Crew Trains for Mission Around Moon
summary: Four astronauts are getting ready for a big trip around the Moon. They are practicing for Artemis II, a special space trip.
Artemis II will be a big space trip with people. They will check a spaceship and rocket for 10 days to get ready for going to the Moon later.

missionTitle: A Walk Through the Rainbow with PACE
summary: NASA's PACE mission is like looking at a rainbow to learn about the sky and the sea. It will help us know more about our planet.
PACE will help us learn about the ocean. It will look at tiny water plants to see how healthy the ocean is.

missionTitle: NASA’s PACE Mission Will Uncover New Information About Health of Our Oceans
summary: PACE will use special tools to learn how our oceans are changing. It will help us understand more about the ocean and the air.

missionTitle: Two Rovers to Roll on Mars Again: Curiosity and Mars 2020
summary: Next summer, two special robots called rovers will explore Mars. They will look for signs of life from a long time ago.
The Space Shuttle was a very special spaceship. It could be used many times. It flew to space like a rocket and landed like an airplane.

missionTitle: NASA’s Webb Delivers Deepest Infrared Image of Universe Yet
summary: NASA's big telescope, James Webb, took a very special picture of space. It shows lots of galaxies very far away.
You can take a special tour to see the Hubble spacecraft in space. It's like you are there!

missionTitle: NASA’s Webb Sheds Light on Galaxy Evolution, Black Holes
summary: The James Webb telescope took a new picture showing how galaxies change and make new stars. It helps us learn about space.
NASA is making new ways to land people on the Moon. They are planning to take the first woman and the first person of color to the Moon.

missionTitle: NASA Selects Companies to Develop Commercial Destinations in Space
summary: NASA is working with three companies to make new places in space where people can go. These will be like space stations.
